You can view and respond to this request at {{curator_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Dear Sponsorcraft Admin,

{{user_name}} with email address {user_email} has started a project on Sponsorcraft. You can view the project at {{project_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Thank you for starting a project on Sponsorcraft. You can view your project at {{project_preview_url}}.

After submitting your project, our moderation team will review your project and reply with feedback within 1 working day.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

—
For advice and tips on crafting an awesome project, visit https://sponsorcraft.com/college/

 [[Edit your project]]

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Thank you for submitting your project, {{project_name}}.

Our moderation team will review your project and reply with feedback within 1 working day.

It's a good idea to start planning the promotion of your project. There are some things you can do already, such as starting a Facebook page. Please view the attached Promotion Checklist, which is imperative to project success.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

The project, {{project_name}}, was submitted.

You can view the project at {{project_preview_url}}.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

Thank you for submitting your project on Sponsorcraft. Our moderation team have reviewed your project and made the following suggestions. We do this for all projects to improve their chances of success.

Some suggestions are recommended and some are mandatory. When you are ready, just hit submit!

{{moderation_table}}

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

If you have any questions, please contact info@sponsorcraft.com.

Dear {{sponsor_first_name}},

The project, {{project_name}}, reached its completion date and achieved its {{next_milestone}}!.

Your pledge of £{{pledge_amount}} failed during processing. This can happen if you haven't entered your card details in your PayPal account, your card expires, you cancel the pre-approval agreement, or for a number of other reasons.

Please visit {{payment_url}} to view your pledge and to retry the transaction. Your crafter needs you!

Many thanks!

Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Congratulations - we have just processed your project pledges!

Unfortunately, one or more pledges to your project were not succesfully collected. This can happen because sponsors cancel pledges or for a variety of other reasons.

We have emailed the Sponsor(s) concerned to encourage them to put this right!

You can see which of your pledges have been successfully collected by visiting your project dashboard at {{dashboard_url}}.

Please consult your project dashboard for the delivery addresses of your sponsors.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.

subject_en_uk: Your project reached its completion date
body_en_uk:
Dear {{crafter_first_name}},

Your project, {{project_name}}, has reached its completion date but, sadly, has not achieved its first milestone so no funds will be transferred.

Please email your sponsors to thank them for their pledges. You can do this through your dashboard at {{dashboard_url}}.

If you would like to submit an improved or new project we would be delighted to help.

Thank you for using Sponsorcraft. We are constantly trying to improve our service and would love your feedback. Please go to {{questionnaire_url}} to let us know your thoughts.

Your friendly Sponsorcraft website robot.
